mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID memId, TEAM_ID teamId, NAME, ROLL, PASSWORD, SSN, AGE, GENDER FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID LIKE #{memId}
SELECT MEM_ID memId, TEAM_ID teamId, NAME, ROLL, PASSWORD, SSN, AGE, GENDER FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID LIKE #{memId} AND PASSWORD LIKE #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEM_ID, TEAM_ID, NAME, ROLL, PASSWORD, SSN, AGE, GENDER) VALUES (#{memId}, #{teamId}, #{name}, #{roll}, #{password}, #{ssn} , #{age}, #{gender});
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID LIKE #{memId} AND PASSWORD LIKE #{password};
